title: Yet another dynamic q rant
body:
I f**king sick of going in as a solo player and getting paired verse a 4-5 man pre made team thinking they have earnt a legit rank.
I'm sick off having 4-5 people toplane at 10mins just because their toplaner is whining in their skypecall how annoying the singed is.

I'm also f**king sick of getting paired vs people a whole league up from me who end up shit stomping our poor bot laners Who are 2 leagues down from those people. Then those said people spam "GG EASIST GAME OF MY LIFE" in all chat not giving a crap that they are the reason why people believe in elo hell.
On the topic of elo hell, its easier to get stuck in because of the premade teams they are versing, with better communication than pinging and raging.

Riot fix this shit or bring back solo queue. They are the only 2 ways around it, if you bring back solo queue every solo player can actully play again.
Fix dynamic and make it fair on solo's by only pairing with other solo's.
(This is coming from a person who has put $250 plus into this game over the years and jesus the games turned to shit because of dynamic queue)

Before you ask me "why don't you get a team and do premade?" think about it, playing with a 5 man premade until your challenger wouldn't give you a legit rank it's cheating the system, that may aswell be ranked fives or ranked threes.

Also honestly what sounds better?

I SOLO'D MY WAY TO DIAMOND BY MYSELF.

or

I WAS IN A 5 MAN PREMADE AND GOT DIAMOND BECAUSE MY TEAM CARRIED ME EVERY GAME.

replies.body:
Lots of people prefer to play with teammates not because they have something to brag about, but its generally more fun.

And your not playing russian roulette when queueing up.

Thats what norms are for, for friends to play with each other or solo players to practice. Ranked is for try hard competitive players not for the pussy I need a friend to even play well players.

Dynamic queue just takes the skill out of climbing elo, its pretty much the better communication in a Skype call wins the game.
Ranked is more competitive and in my opinion more fun. And you would rather get ranks and ip rather than just the ip from norms

because getting bronze 5 and 20 ip is fun because they are 5 man? gonna have to agree with the other guy on this 1, the solo/duo queue and teams worked better, only advantage of new ranked is the choosing lane.

I clearly never said it was fun for the solo player, and yes what he said is pretty true and solo/duo queue does work better imo despite my love for dynamic, I just noticed he doesnt really understand why most people play in a team in League when he said this.

>> Before you ask me whyy dont you get a team and do premade? think about it, playing with a 5 man premade until your challenger wouldnt give you a legit rank its cheating the system, that may aswell be ranked fives or ranked threes.
> 
> Also honestly what sounds better?
> 
> I SOLO MY WAY TO DIAMOND BY MYSELF.
> 
> or
> 
> I WAS IN A 5 MAN PREMADE AND GOT DIAMOND BECAUSE MY TEAM CARRIED ME EVERY GAME.
Ip is irrelevant in this discussion since most people will have the champs and runes they are comfortable with in ranked and not be after more ip for champs, just elo.
but the outlier I stated was ranks, why would you start talking about ip?
My bad I have a very odd font turned on for some reason thought it said IP rather than LP

_"That's what norms are for"_ 

Argument over. You lose. No, that is what League of Legends is for. It's a game to play, whether it's with your friends or not. The fact that you make a post dedicated to hating on people who play ranked with their friends is just ridiculous. You are allowed to have fun playing a game with your friends, and its not earning a "free rank". And even if it was, they are allowed to do it.

Who are you to tell people that playing games with their friends is wrong. You go on about getting to Diamond on your own but you were Silver last season and Bronze so far this season. Look, how does having the enemy team be premade effect you? You are complaining that it's bad for them to be getting a "free" rank, so doesn't that just mean your going up against more coordinated opponents? And by your logic, that sounds like a good thing?

Sigh.

think of it this way its you and 4 randoms who dont know each other vs a team thats all friends in a skype call, one team has a massive advantage over the other team. my rank is pointless since you are in the same rank and cannot be fighting over it. also having 4 people in toplane at 12 minutes to dive me (#campdyrus) is annoying and just shits on our team by having massive camps. like litterly i walked into lane their jungler and midlaner were straight their and forced me to blow ghost too escape and tp to come back, the massive camp really wasnt needed since i was singed vs olaf toplane (any good singed / olaf knows olaf shits on singed)

I also never stated i am diamond, and never stated i will be any time soon, im one of the 40% of people waiting for riot to fix this queue or release solo queue before we start climbing.

Heres a youtube video on this guy that shares the exact same opinion as me : [](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4A6_A-KsxzI)

> [{quoted}](name=Chase4Candy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mcAVuMOe,comment-id=0000000000020000,timestamp=2016-04-25T08:11:03.554+0000)
>
> think of it this way its you and 4 randoms who dont know each other vs a team thats all friends in a skype call, one team has a massive advantage over the other team. my rank is pointless since you are in the same rank. also having 4 people in toplane at 12 minutes is annoying and just shits on our team by having massive camps, nothing to stop them (other than wards)

that's almost statistically impossible, like seriously. especially in your elo

My replays dont lie, 4 members having the same club name making it look so obvious that they are all premades just by the way the played and all . also at the end stated that they are all premade and they are sorry.

> [{quoted}](name=Chase4Candy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mcAVuMOe,comment-id=000000000002000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-25T08:50:44.987+0000)
>
> My replays dont lie, 4 members having the same club name making it look so obvious that they are all premades just by the way the played and all . also at the end stated that they are all premade and they are sorry.

4 members? im talking about 5 here

in bronze elo i doubt there will be 5 comms v 5 soloers

Sure it's competitive, I never said it wasn't.

Some people just prefer to play competitively with friends, even if it means sacrificing something to brag about. It's not like you can't have fun in ranked, hell it's more intense in ranked and I love it.

> I WAS IN A 5 MAN PREMADE AND GOT DIAMOND BECAUSE MY TEAM CARRIED ME EVERY GAME.

hmm seems like me

I like dynamic q I mean yeah I'm a solo player and I feel the pain but ou saying getting paired against a 4 man it make no difference I was paired with a 4 man and they all fed and got completely destroyed I like that you don't need to call lane and it's just set and it's better for q times to only have 1 q system also I see that playing solo in dynamic the Lp gain is a lot more win and less loss my Lp for a loss is only 16 and wins are always 25

Queue times are long enough as it is. If you get rid of dynamic queue you have two options:
1. Super long wait times
2. You don't get to pick your roles anymore

I pretty much only play solo (maybe duo) in ranked and I definitely prefer the way the game is now compared to before.

They can keep the pick your 2 roles part like yea thats fine, the annoying part is going verse the premade 3+ with a massive advantage over your team, making it harder to carry as a solo player.

Queue times are bad because most plays norms, because no one really are taking ranked seriously with others abusing the dynamic queue using premade commuinacation, if Gross Gore (used to be worlds best tf player till he got banned for twitch related issues) can get challenger in 2 weeks in dynamic queue when previously he struggled for 2 years something is wrong with the system..
before fighting about it watch this video made by a fellow singed main.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L8H2V0dBL1I
agree bring back solo/duo and teams

Just bring back solo queue. Listen to the pros, they demand it also. Dynamic queue lowers the skill level. Instead of making it so that real players are insulted by noob players and becoming frustrated by the lack of skill shown. We have ranked teams for multiple players.
